summary: August 31 is the 243rd day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Shi Tingmao  is a Chinese diver representing Chongqing diving team. She won the gold medal in women's 1m springboard at the 2011 World Aquatics Championships in Shanghai, becoming the first Chinese diver from provincial team to participate the World Championships.
title: Shi Tingmao
